comments.body: Why do we have two back ticks here?
I thought I'd just fixed that... anyway, it's in a comment

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +465,469 @@    *************************************************

    All interaction with the DA ledger, be it sandbox or full ledger server, happens via the :doc:`Ledger API </app-dev/index>``. It is based on `gRPC <https://grpc.io/>`_.

    The Navigator uses this API, as will any :ref:`custom integration <quickstart-application>`.

comments.body:
I don't know whether/how to improve this, but it's not accurate to say that `daml studio` needs to be run from the root of the project, it only needs to be run inside the project (not necessarily the root), and that will cause VSCode to be opened at the root of the project.

```suggestion
#. Open :doc:`DAML Studio </daml/daml-studio>`, a DAML IDE based on VS Code, by running ``daml studio`` from the root of your project.
```
I think this is fine within this set of instructions. Will make sure it's clearer elsewhere if it needs to be.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +264,268 @@Take a look at the DAML that specifies the contract model in the quickstart application. The core template is ``Iou``.

#. Open :doc:`DAML Studio </daml/daml-studio>`, a DAML IDE based on VS Code, by running ``daml studio`` from the root of your project.
#. Using the explorer on the left, open ``daml/Iou.daml``.
